question: Which sportsperson became the first woman to co-pilot combat fighter jet "Tejas" at the Aero-India 2019 exhibition held in Bengaluru?
explanation: P V Sindhu became the first woman to co-pilot combat fighter jet "Tejas" at the Aero-India 2019 exhibition held in Bengaluru. The 12th biennial edition of International Aerospace and Defence Exhibition “2019 Aero India” was held from 20 to 24 February 2019 at the Air Force Station Yelahanka in Bengaluru, Karnataka inaugurated by defence minister Nirmala Sitharaman.
